plot: Derek is a young flamingo who desperately wants to live among the humans of his island. After telling his parents his big secret, he wakes up to discover that his wish has come true - but at a price.
title: Derek: The Last Flamingo
plot_es: Derek is a young flamingo who desperately wants to live among the humans of his island. After telling his parents his big secret, he wakes up to discover that his wish has come true - but at a price.
plot_en: Derek is a young flamingo who desperately wants to live among the humans of his island. After telling his parents his big secret, he wakes up to discover that his wish has come true - but at a price.
